answers.answer: would you pass on any info you might have on cerebellar degeneration?  we have a family member who has just been diagnosed......he has a first cousin who is completely bedridden with hereditary progressive degenerative ataxia and we are concerned these conditions may be related.......any info you have would be greatly appreciated....thanks

question: MY MOTHER'S FATHER AND BROTHER BOTH DIED OF CDD -  AVE RECENTLY BEEN DIGNOSED WITH HERITARY HEMOCHROMATOSIS [HH] AND WONDER IF THERE IS A RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN CDD AND HH - MY 82 YEARS OLD MOTHER HAS DIABETES BUT NOT CDD - OUR FAMILY IS OF IRISH DECENT AND IRISH POPULATIONS CAN HAVE CARRIERS IN 1 IN 4 - DO YOU HAVE ANY INFO ABOUT THIS
title: CEREBELLUM DEGENERATIVE DISEASE [CDD]
